basics.name: Tejas Bachhav
basics.label: Cloud Engineer
basics.summary: Tejas is currently working as a Cloud Automation Engineer.He helped various clients to automate their cloud infrastructure by providing robust and modular solutions for better performance and efficiency.Tejas has used Ansible, Jenkins CI/CD, Shell, PowerShell, Azure, AWS extensively while building the solution. He shares a great interest in Cloud infrastructure, DevOps, AI/ML, and Quantum Computing. His Goal is to make the Earth more greener and sustainable for the upcoming generation.

work.name: Accenture
work.summary: - Develop industry-standard Infrastructure as code Solutions for potential clients. Identify, build and deploy robust solutions on the cloud with a modular approach. Identifying faults, rectification of errors, planning of tasks ahead of time for enhancing automation performance.
highlights: Helped clients to reduce hours of server deployement and configuration work from 40 hours to 4 minutes
Created Documetation to create stepwise process for installation and configuration procedures

volunteer.summary: Create teams and lead them for NSS events.
highlights: Awarded for 'Disaster recovery and urgent help' in a natural calamity at College
Attended Campsight for 7 days at remote village area to promote health, sanity and install good habits in people

certificates.name: Introduction to TensorFlow for Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning
Red Hat Certified System Administrator (RHCSA) Rapid Customized Track

references.name: Peter
references.reference: I would recommend Tejas as he has helped the clients to build robust automations using Ansible. Tejas has tremendous work ethic and a strong desire to learn and grow. He provides effective communication and collaboration towards creating a mature and robust automation offering for our customers. Tejas has a great attitude and is always willing and forthcoming to anyone who needs his help

projects.name: Twitter Analysis using machine learning algorithms
projects.description: AIM: to indentofy fake accounts on Twitter and stop spreading rumors…
highlights: Won best seminar topic award in college
